data.comment: The match is underway at José Zorrilla.
Throw-in Valladolid.
In the minute 1, Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Valladolid throw-in in Alaves's half.
Sergi Guardiola for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 4, Valladolid's Toni Villa is on target but unsuccessful.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero blows against Valladolid's Sergi Guardiola for offside.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valladolid's half?
In the minute 6, Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valladolid to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Corner awarded to Valladolid.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Free kick for Valladolid in the half of Alaves.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valladolid.
In the minute 12, Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Valladolid a goal kick.
Can Valladolid capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Alaves's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Alaves.
Goal kick for Alaves at José Zorrilla.
In Valladolid Valladolid attack through Shon Weissman. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 16, Alaves have a goal kick.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
An attacking Alaves player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 21, Valladolid are down to 10 men after Nacho Martinez has been shown a red card.
Alaves are awarded a penalty ... Lucas Perez botches the spot kick!
Lucas Perez hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Alaves in Valladolid.
In the minute 23, Valladolid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The home team replace Shon Weissman with Raul Garcia.
Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, Alaves needs to be cautious. Valladolid have an attacking throw-in.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, In Valladolid, Jota of Alaves is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a throw-in for Valladolid, close to Alaves's area.
Valladolid have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Alaves close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
Throw-in for Valladolid in their own half.
In the minute 37, Alaves drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valladolid's half?
Throw-in Valladolid.
In the minute 39, Throw-in high up the field for Alaves in Valladolid.
Valladolid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Alaves!
In the minute 41, Alaves attack but Joselu's header doesn't find the target.
Valladolid have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Alaves.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Alaves.
In the minute 43, Toni Villa for Valladolid has been booked by Jose Luis Munuera Montero and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 45, Jose Luis Munuera Montero will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Valladolid have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
Valladolid surge into the attack at José Zorrilla but Joaquin Fernandez’s header is off-target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Valladolid.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
In the minute 45, In Valladolid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Alaves a goal kick.
The first-half is over at José Zorrilla.
In the minute 46, Jose Luis Munuera Montero has blown to start the second-half.
Valladolid to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Valladolid throw-in in Alaves's half.
In the minute 46, Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards the away team a throw-in.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Valladolid.
Can Valladolid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Valladolid throw-in in Alaves's half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in high up the field for Valladolid in Valladolid.
Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Alaves.
Throw-in Alaves.
In the minute 51, Alaves push upfield but Jose Luis Munuera Montero quickly pulls them for offside.
Valladolid to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 53, Valladolid needs to be cautious. Alaves have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Alaves at José Zorrilla.
Goal kick for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
In the minute 55, Goal! Alaves have got their heads in front thanks to a Tomas Pina strike.
Jota instrumental with a fine assist.
Valladolid have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valladolid's half?
Throw-in Valladolid.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
Marcos De Sousa is replacing Kike Perez for the home team.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Valladolid make their third substitution with Roque Mesa replacing Toni Villa.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Valladolid.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Alaves throw-in in Valladolid's half.
In the minute 61, Alaves's Jota gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
In Valladolid, Valladolid push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
In the minute 67, Alaves drive upfield and Ruben Duarte gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Valladolid defender.
Alaves's Lucas Perez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Valladolid defender.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
In the minute 69, Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Valladolid.
Throw-in for Alaves close to the penalty box.
In the minute 71, Pablo Machin is making the team's first substitution at José Zorrilla with Deyverson replacing Joselu.
Alaves to take a throw-in in Valladolid territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valladolid.
In the minute 76, Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valladolid's half?
Alaves are coming forward and Ximo Navarro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Valladolid a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Alaves.
Valladolid are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
In Valladolid, Edgar Mendez (Alaves) misses the target with a header.
Valladolid have a goal kick.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a throw-in for Valladolid, close to Alaves's area.
In the minute 80, Can Valladolid capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Alaves's half?
In the minute 80, Luis Perez is on a sub for Ruben Alcaraz for Valladolid.
Oscar Plano is replacing Saidy Janko for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
Throw-in for Alaves at José Zorrilla.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Valladolid in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Alaves make their second substitution with Martin Aguirregabiria replacing Edgar Mendez.
Pablo Machin (Alaves) is making a third substitution, with Manu Garcia replacing Jota.
In the minute 84, Borja Sainz is on a sub for Lucas Perez for Alaves.
Alaves take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Borja Sainz.
That's a fine assist from Deyverson.
In the minute 89, Valladolid push forward at José Zorrilla and Luis Perez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Alaves defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marcos De Sousa for Valladolid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 89, It's a goal kick for the away team in Valladolid.
Goal kick for Alaves at José Zorrilla.
Alaves advance rapidly upfield but Jose Luis Munuera Montero blows for offside.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Alaves's Borja Sainz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valladolid to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Alaves have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Valladolid. The final score is 0-2.
